name: sketch-to-color
shortDescription: Sketch to Color Image generation is an image-to-image translation model using Conditional Generative Adversarial Networks. The model was trained on the Anime Sketch-Colorization Pair Dataset available on Kaggle which contains 14.2k pairs of Sketch-Color Anime Images. The training of the model was done for 150 epochs which took approximately 23 hours on a single GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Graphic Card and 16 GB RAM.
longDescription: Sketch to Color Image generation is an image-to-image translation model using Conditional Generative Adversarial Networks. The model was trained on the Anime Sketch-Colorization Pair Dataset available on Kaggle which contains 14.2k pairs of Sketch-Color Anime Images. The training of the model was done for 150 epochs which took approximately 23 hours on a single GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Graphic Card and 16 GB RAM.
